mods.abstract: WLAC program Music In The Night, originally broadcast 1948-11-07, part 2. Featuring organist Mary Elizabeth Hicks with host/announcer Bill Johnson reading poems by Charles S. Roberts.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
